snippet.title: Dark Summoner's Game Trailer - Full version
snippet.description:
*App Store:http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/dark-summoner/id480950048?mt=8
*GooglePlay:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.darksummoner
*Website:http://www.darksummoner.com/
*Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/darksummoner.us/
*Twitter:https://twitter.com/DarkSummoner_us
--------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------
High-quality game that has been downloaded over 7 million times worldwide!
Dark Summoner continues to evolve without bounds!

The Clan League has been officially released!
Battle alongside your Allies!
----------------------------------------

Garnering Critical Acclaim from Around the World!
Dark Summoner, a Dark Fantasy Social Game Gem!
Downloaded over 7 million times worldwide!
Overwhelming Quality Recognized Around the Globe!

***********************************************************
[Game Introduction]

Bring about an end to the war that's plunged the world into chaos!
Summon powerful Rare Monsters and power them up to be mighty warriors for your cause.
Form Clans with your friends and aim for the top rank!

■Featuring artwork by many famous Japanese and international artists!
A large number of artists from Japan and other countries have contributed to the game.
Gorgeous illustrations and intense CG movies deepen the game experience.

■Features over 2,800 Monsters!
Featuring more than 1,200 types of monsters designed by famous artists!
Monsters are frequently added! Get them all to complete your collection!

■Power up your monsters!
Make sacrifices to the monsters you've collected to create the strongest team.
Raise epic monsters and become the best!

■Team up with friends to defeat legendary Dark Lord Raid Bosses!
Summon legendary Dark Lords using items gathered from completing missions.
Cooperate with friends to defeat the Dark Lords and their unbelievable power!
Defeated Dark Lords will join your team!

■Form Clans with your friends!
In the newly implemented Clan System,
create and develop Clans with your friends to gain bonuses!
Battle against your Clan mates in future in-game events!
Secure your spot in history alongside your friends!

■Craft Relica that can influence the outcome of Battle!
Monsters aren't the only vital part of Battles!
Gather Magic Crystals to Craft powerful Items,
and equip them to boost your stats!
There are endless combinations! Find the one that suits your play style!

■Only have a few minutes free? That's OK!
The game is playable even if you only have a few minutes to spare.
Play at your own pace -- on the train to work or school, before bed, whatever fits your lifestyle!

■New free events and updates added monthly!
New events and content are added to the game each month.
Dark Summoner is constantly evolving!

***********************************************************
